title: "EU policymakers enter the last mile for Artificial Intelligence rulebook"
excerpt: "The world’s first comprehensive AI law is entering what might be its last weeks of intense negotiations. However, EU institutions have still to hash out their approach to the most powerful ‘foundation’ models and the provisions in the law enforcement areas."
